title: Digital Marketing Manager
description:
Want to **LOVE** where you work and get full training to do it?


Jacoby & Meyers is the nation's preeminent law firm protecting consumers since 1972. We are currently seeking a smart and determined Digital Marketing Manager to join our growing team. At Jacoby and Meyers, every single employee gets to make an impact. Our values guide the way we work with each other. It's a culture where you have the freedom to experiment and push your talents as far as they can go.

**Job Title:** Digital Marketing Manager

**Pay Range:** $70,000 - $135,000


**Type of Position:** Full Time

**Location:**Hybrid


**Job Description:**


Core duties and responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned.

* Designing campaign, content and video strategies that transmit the organization’s goals and objectives together with the Marketing team.
* Plan, execute, and manage all digital marketing for the firm, including SEO, SEM, email marketing, and social media
* Responsible for ensuring consistent brand messaging across all various social media channels
* Stay up to date on the latest social media trends, and implement them in the firm’s marketing campaigns
* Liaising with third parties like digital agencies and software vendors to optimize channels, bidding and targeting strategies.
* Analyzing performance drives to improve campaign profitability and contributes towards yearly marketing budgets, KPIs, and ROI.
* Develop and monitor campaign budgets
* Designing and implementing digital strategy as part of the company’s broader business and marketing plans, building affinity and leading demand generation.
* Establish and execute a digital marketing strategy to distribute content

**Qualifications:**

* Very well organized
* Good follow-up and follow through
* Bilingual (Spanish)
* Strong communication skills
* Project management and managerial skills
* Ability to analyze metrics, reports, and trends regarding consumers
* Hands on experience with SEO/SEM, Google Analytics, and CRM software
* Solid knowledge of online marketing tools and best practices
* Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with other departments

**Education and/or Experience:**

* Bachelor's Degree (or equivalent) from a 4 year university in Marketing
* 5+ years of experience with record of digital marketing background
* Demonstrable experience in implementing and designing digital marketing campaigns

 **Computer Skills:**


To perform this job successfully, an individual should have knowledge of Internet software; Spreadsheet software and Word Processing software.

**What We Offer:*** Medical, Dental, Vision and Pet Insurance
* Company-paid Life Insurance and AD&D Coverage, Voluntary Life Insurance
* Voluntary Hospital Plans
* Short-term and Long-term Disability
* Employee Assistance and Travel Assistance Programs
* Paid Time Off, Paid Sick Time, Paid Holidays
* Health FSA and Dependent Care FSA
* Accident Insurance
* Commuter Transportation Incentive
* Pet Insurance
* Flexible Hours
* Fully-paid parking
* 401(k) with Company Match
* Learning and Development Programs
* Remote Positions

**About J&M:**


Jacoby and Meyers was founded in 1972 with the intention of making the legal system more accessible to the average person. Now, more than 50 years later, we continue to help people get the justice and compensation they deserve. Specializing in all types of accident claims, including automobile, motorcycle, bicycle, Uber/Lyft, or trucking accidents, slip and falls, dog bites, construction accidents and other wrongful conduct, the attorneys at Jacoby & Meyers have recovered over a billion dollars for their clients' personal injury and wrongful death claims caused by the negligence of a third party.

**REQUIRED:** Resume, References, Pay Expectation

*Jacoby and Meyers is an Equal Opportunity Employer.*

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description:
**About Club Capital Marketing**  

  

Club Capital Marketing is a dynamic and fast-growing digital marketing agency specializing in Pay-per-Click (PPC), Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Social Media advertising. We are dedicated to helping our clients maximize their online presence and achieve their digital marketing goals. Our team of experts works collaboratively to drive results and deliver exceptional value to our clients.  

  

**Job Description:**  

  

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Digital Marketing Manager to join our digital marketing team. As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing pay-per-click,SEO and Social Media marketing campaigns on various platforms. Your primary goal will be to drive traffic, conversions, and ROI for our clients.  

  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

  

1. **PPC Campaign Management**: Create, manage, and optimize PPC campaigns across multiple platforms, including Google Ads, Microsoft Advertising, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.  

  

2. **Keyword Research**: Conduct thorough keyword research to identify high-potential keywords, long-tail opportunities, and negative keywords to improve campaign performance.  

  

3. **Ad Copywriting**: Write compelling ad copy that aligns with client goals and encourages click-through rates and conversions.  

  

4. **Budget Management**: Monitor and allocate campaign budgets effectively to ensure maximum ROI and efficient spending.  

  

5. **Bid Management**: Implement strategic bidding strategies to optimize ad positions and control costs.  

  

6. **A/B Testing**: Continuously test and refine ad creatives, landing pages, and targeting parameters to improve campaign performance.  

  

7. **Analytics and Reporting**: Analyze campaign data, generate performance reports, and provide actionable insights to clients and the team.  

  

8. **Client Collaboration**: Work closely with clients to understand their business objectives, communicate campaign progress, and provide recommendations for improvement.  

  

9. **Lead Generation Expertise**: Experience with lead generation PPC campaigns is a significant advantage, as you will be expected to drive quality leads for clients.  

  

10. **SEO Proficiency**: Identify strategies, techniques and tactics to increase the number of visitors to websites and obtain high-ranking placement in the results page of search engines.  

  

11. **Social Media Skills**:Develop social media marketing campaigns. Analyze the digital marketing plan and social media strategy and identify strategic weaknesses and make recommendations for improvements.  

  

12. **Stay Informed**: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and algorithm changes to ensure that campaigns are always optimized.  

  

**Qualifications:**  

  

* Bachelor's degree in marketing, advertising, or a related field.
* Proven experience managing PPC campaigns on Google Ads, Microsoft Advertising, and social media platforms (Facebook, LinkedIn).
* Expertise in optimizing Search Engine Optimization.
* Skill in all aspects of Social Media advertising.
* Proficiency in keyword research tools, bid management, and analytics platforms.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Exceptional attention to detail and organizational abilities.
* Adept at multitasking and working in a fast-paced environment.
* Google Ads and Microsoft Advertising certifications are a plus.

  

**Why Join Club Capital Marketing:**  

  

* Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Opportunity to work with diverse clients across various industries.
* Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
* Access to cutting-edge digital marketing tools and technologies.

  

If you are a results-driven digital marketer with a passion for PPC, SEO and Social Media advertising and the ability to maximize ROI, we invite you to join our team and make a significant impact on our clients' online success.  

  

  

Club Capital Marketing is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply. We look forward to hearing from you and potentially welcoming you to our team!  

This is a remote position.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description:
**Who We Are Looking For:**


The Digital Marketing Manager (who MUST HAVE life sciences industry experience) is an individual contributor and hands-on role. This individual will primarily contribute to the development and implementation of a multi-channel marketing strategy for all brands in the target market. You will identify, research and implement digital activities that allow Pharmaron to communicate the brand and portfolio messages to the target audience in a customized way. You, under guidance, will contribute to building the multi-channel approach from concept to completion to ensure that Pharmaron communicates more effectively via various digital channels and meets business objectives.

**Position Responsibilities**

* Lead digital initiatives within target market, working closely with the sales, marketing and talent acquisition teams
* Support commercial leads in optimizing campaigns with digital components
* Build understanding of customer preferences and drive suggestions for adapting campaign elements
* Manage web-related inquiries and respondents
* Lead all phases of digital production and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) of digital assets and campaigns (e.g., IVAs, videos)
* Establish collaborative and productive, professional relationships with key internal stakeholders as well as external support
* Support the sales team in CRM management, building customer engagement plans that leverage digital tactics
* Establish and implement SEO initiatives, track analytics
* Help establish and deliver the brand metrics and KPIs for digital components, as well as set analytics priorities for digital tactics
* Compile and report on analytics
* Monitor social media for conversations and trends related to company brand and feedback insights to the Regional to align overall business strategy
* Measure the impact of social media programs; analyze, review and report on the effectiveness of our company's social

 **Minimum Requirements**

* Bachelor's Degree in marketing, business, scientific area or related field required
* 5+ years of digital marketing experience, preferably within the life sciences industry
* Proven digital execution in multichannel marketing
* Strong analytical skills, communication skills with the ability to evaluate KPIs, present learnings based on data, and optimize
* In-depth knowledge of digital marketing within the pharmaceutical or healthcare industry.

**Remotely based in any US city**

**About Pharmaron:**


We are a dynamic, fast-growing company, operating in the critical sector of the life sciences industry. With a reputation for leading-edge science, we offer contract research services to some of the world's leading pharmaceutical companies, solving what were believed to be unsolvable scientific challenges.


We are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of scientific excellence, always operating ethically and with integrity. We take pride in our professionalism and our commitment to always deliver our very best work.

**Why Should You Apply?**

* This is an opportunity for you to make a real impact in a fast-growing and highly respected CRO
* We provide an environment that sets and commits to the highest standards
* You will be part of a team who support each other, embrace challenges, and put excellence at the heart of all we do

description:

title: Digital Marketer
description:
Job Description:

* Supports organization staff by establishing and interviewing program; counselling managers on candidate selection; conducting and analyzing exit interviews; and recommending changes.
* Prepares employees for assignments by establishing and conducting orientation and training programs.
* Manages a pay plan by conducting periodic pay surveys; scheduling and conducting job evaluations; preparing pay budgets; monitoring and scheduling individual pay actions; and recommending, planning, and implementing pay structure revisions.
* Ensures planning, monitoring, and appraisal of employee work results by training managers to coach and discipline employees; scheduling management conferences with employees; hearing and resolving employee grievances; and counselling employees and supervisors.
* Implements employee benefits programs and informs employees of benefits by studying and assessing benefit needs and trends; recommending benefit programs to management; directing the processing of benefit claims; obtaining and evaluating benefit contract bids; awarding benefit contracts; and designing and conducting educational programs on benefit programs.
* Ensures legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable human resource federal and state requirements, conducting investigations, maintaining records, and representing the organization at hearings.

title: Marketer
description:
**About the Role:**
-------------------


**Star Sports is the leading sports broadcaster in India. It offers a wide variety of sports content, broadcasting all major sports events such as IPL, ICC, Premier League, Pro Kabaddi, Wimbledon etc. Star Sports has redefined sports broadcasting in India with extensive cricket coverage, including domestic and international matches. It also offers several regional channels in different languages to cater to the diverse linguistic audience in India. We serve high quality content to millions of customers with world class technology and production. We are now seeking an individual to join our dynamic marketing team. This position is responsible for handling strategy & marketing plans for sports & grassroots initiatives like Khelo India Youth Games.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Context:**
------------


**Star Sports is a key catalyst in espousing a multisport culture in India. Over the past 5 years, it has invested in and partnered with key stakeholders to popularize sports beyond Cricket. You will play a crucial role in supporting the smooth functioning of our organization. Your focus will be to grow viewership of the event on TV and to deepen engagement with light, medium and heavy consumers of the sport/event. The role will also oversee marketing efforts to recruit new viewers into the fold of the sport/event.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

* **Data Analysis: Assimilating and analyzing viewership trends, triggers and barriers for viewership for each property/event & ratifying different hypothesis basis the data analysis with the help of primary or secondary research where applicable.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Insight Development: Developing actionable insights into effective product, media, and communication plans.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Goal Setting: Developing and aligning the key goals for the marketing task ranging from awareness targets, intention to watch targets, media reach targets and viewership targets (TVR/event reach/frequency/consumption)**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Planning & Project Management: Planning and executing marketing plans for the key properties. Working with diverse and multi-functional project teams to manage end to end delivery of marketing plans for the different properties.**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Marketing Communications: Developing clear briefs for the various properties/events as per the aligned goals/deliverables. Briefing the internal and external creative teams and clearly articulating the insights, potential campaign spaces and delivery expectations. Aligning the approach and finalization of the marketing communication plan (which should cover own media, paid media, digital, social, activations & programming) for the event. Driving the execution of individual plans along with a clear cascade plan which captures the on-air dates for all the different tactical elements of the marketing plan.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Campaign Execution: Working closely with Internal and External partners: Advertising agencies, media planners and media partners (Radio/Print/TV channels), research agencies, activation agencies, social and digital agencies, production houses/partners, Bollywood, and music studios. Developing 360 degree digital and communication plans through collaboration with key stakeholders: programming/content, ad-sales, distribution and internal corporate communications team. Assisting in planning and managing yearly multi-crore budgets in paid media and Star owned media for large impact properties.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Project tracking and review: Tracking the deliverables against the aligned goals/targets and crystallizing action points to be corrected in the next event.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------

* **Viewership targets.**
-----------------------
* **Ideation and innovation.**
----------------------------
* **Cross functional collaboration**
----------------------------------

**Qualifications:**
-------------------

* **Qualification: MBA (Top-tier B-School)**
------------------------------------------
* **4 - 6 years of core marketing/brand experience and experience in driving ATL/BTL plans for large national consumer brands.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Personal Attributes:**
------------------------

* **Understanding of marketing principles, media planning, consumer research, ATL/BTL campaign development.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Taking initiative and leading/managing teams.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Clarity of thoughts in strategic initiatives.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Sports Aficionado.**
----------------------

**About Star Sports :**
-----------------------

**The Star Sports Network is home to several leading domestic and international sports with 17 channels broadcasting premier sporting events which include cricket coverage under the purview of the TATA Indian Premier League (IPL), International Cricket Council (ICC), Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), Cricket South Africa and Asian Cricket Council (ACC); VIVO Pro Kabaddi; Football under Hero Indian Super League (ISL), Premier League; and Wimbledon amongst others.**

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Seeking Marketing Manager to drive strategic initiatives, manage campaigns, and enhance brand visibility. Responsibilities include developing marketing plans, overseeing advertising efforts, and analyzing market trends. The ideal candidate possesses strong leadership skills, creative thinking, and proficiency in digital marketing tools. With a proven track record in marketing strategy execution, they will propel our brand to new heights.


###### **Responsibilities:**


* Work collaboratively to strategically plan, develop and execute marketing campaigns to market diverse products and services while reinforcing our brand attributes and differentiators.


* Research, develop, execute, manage, and measure the effectiveness of integrated marketing campaigns and communications to support business strategies for both internal and external audiences (including customers, industry partners, vendors, community stakeholders, industry associations, etc.).


* Responsible for overall development and maintenance of website including page updates, new page development, blogs, case studies and other resources.


* Work closely with SEO partners to ensure success of website and online advertising opportunities.


* Proficient in social media engagement via Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.


* Create compelling, informative and audience-centric marketing and communications materials including: briefs, corporate profiles, key messages, executive speaking notes, customer presentations, brochures, videos, photo library, advertising copy, and digital and print content.


* Oversee hiring and managing of contractors (designers, writers, editors and other creative staff) to assist in the creation of internal and external communications tools.


* Identify and coordinate participation in industry trade shows and events.


* Monitor market trends and research consumer markets and competitors' activities to aid in the development of marketing campaigns and inspire the development of high-quality creative assets.


* Ensure all products, services and communication materials conform to brand identity.


* Oversee the application process of vendor joint marketing programs.


* Manage internal communication programming and messaging.


* Analyze marketing performance, optimize ROI for all advertising channels and events.

  


###### **Basic Qualifications:**


* Bachelors Degree/ Master ‘ degree in marketing
* 3-5 years of progressive, related experience in marketing and communications strategy and execution, ideally in a corporate setting.
* Exceptional project management skills, collaborative team player able to support multiple business priorities and tight deadlines.
* Experience in working on programs driven by large technology partners like Microsoft, SAP, HP, HCL or other technology companies.
* Strong customer-centric focus, with a proven ability to build and maintain effective relationships at all levels of an organization.
* Experience with social media and metrics data analysis for optimization.
* Grasp of brand development and ability to develop, write and implement strategic, integrated communications and marketing plans to promote brand.
* Strong overall business acumen and strategic mindset including understanding of budgeting, planning, advertising and promotions
* Exceptional writing and storytelling skills (written and verbal).
* Strong attention to detail.
* Team handling capacity
* Ability to drive the campaigns and projects.

title: Brand Manager
description:
**About this Opportunity**

 **Key Responsibilities:**  

In this role, you would be responsible for all the brand marketing activities for redBus india Bus business  

We are looking for someone who is extremely passionate about consumer insights, championing the consumer and brand strategy with the ability to craft integrated marketing plans for Digital, ATL & BTL working in tandem with external agency partners and internal stakeholders. We are looking for someone with a consumer-first mind-set with a keen interest to attribute marketing efforts with business impact, and hence be comfortable with the creative, media and business dimensions of marketing. Another important attribute would be to have an ability to think about brand beyond communication and be a part of the entire journey to develop a holistic brand experience across consumer touch points.  

You would be responsible for **Brand Development:*** Developing and implementing innovative & creative marketing strategies aligned with the overall brand & marketing strategy of redBus India.
* Planning, executing, and tracking the performance of marketing campaigns across digital, ATL, and BTL media.
* Media Strategy and Execution: Translating brand objectives into media strategy and go-to-market media plans. Executing and optimizing media plans with the media agency (digital-first thinking).
* Conducting research on market trends, audiences, competitors, and end-to-end consumer journeys to drive engagements and conversions.
* Working closely with external agencies, influencers, and content creators for effective campaign execution and to drive brand visibility and engagement across platforms.
* Optimizing and analyzing campaign execution spends in accordance with expected revenue and impact on media, brand, and business metrics.

 **Execution and Tracking:*** Execution Excellence: Collaborating closely with the agency, revenue, and brand lead to closely track, manage, and report campaign performance.
* Measuring and reporting performance with comprehensive pre, mid, and post-campaign analysis and assessing ROI with predefined KPIs.
* Ensuring quick turnaround on critical deliverables.
* Demonstrating excellent negotiation skills with vendors to ensure quality, timely delivery, and cost-control.
* Tracking all vendor invoices and payments (pending and delivered).
* Working with the in-house creative team to efficiently deliver artwork for collateral and campaign communication elements.
* Driving the marketing planning & calendar, and activations across ATL, BTL, PR, and Digital.
* Collaborating effectively with cross-functional stakeholders (Product, Supply, etc.) to ensure full support from relevant teams in executing strategy.

 **Educational Qualification:** MBA in marketing or equivalent degree **Years of Experience :** Having 0-3 years of relevant work experience in managing and handling marketing campaigns end to end (from conception, budgeting to execution and tracking performance). Preferably in a new age startup/ consumer tech/ other B2C businesses. **Nature and scope of responsibilities the candidate should have handled**  

 0 to 3 years of prior experience of working as an assistant manager or senior brand executive in core brand management profile, preferably in start-ups /FMCG/ Consumer Tech and other B2C businesses* End to end campaign management – concept, budgeting execution, tracking and reporting
* Strong Communication Skills

* Proficient in Excel / Google Spreadsheets and PowerPoint

title: Digital Marketer
description:
We are looking for a creative and analytical digital marketing manager to join our team. You will be in charge of developing and implementing our digital marketing strategy, as well as managing and overseeing our digital marketing campaigns across all platforms. You will work closely with the marketing team, the sales team, and external partners to achieve our marketing goals and grow our online presence.

  

**Industry Type** Education
  

**Function Area** SEO, SEM, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing
  

**Employment Type** Full Time
  

**Education** Bachelor's degree in marketing, communication, or a related field
  

#### **Digital Marketing Manager Competencies:**


* Strategic thinking
* Data analysis
* Social media marketing
* Content marketing
* SEO
* SEM
* Email marketing
* Creative and communication skills


#### **Job Duties:**


* Plan and execute all digital marketing activities, including SEO, SEM, email, social media, and display advertising


* Design, build, and maintain our website and social media profiles


* Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of our digital marketing campaigns and optimize them based on data and insights


* Identify and research the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing and apply them to our strategy


* Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to create and deliver engaging and relevant content for our target audience


* Manage and allocate the digital marketing budget and resources


* Evaluate and report the ROI and KPIs of our digital marketing efforts


* Manage and mentor the digital marketing team and ensure they meet the quality standards and deadlines

title: Brand Manager
description:
**Designation**- Brand Marketing Manager  

  

**Experience** - 5 Years  

  

**Position Description** – Choosing where to start and grow your career has a major impact on your professional and personal life, so it's equally important you know that the company that you choose to work at, and its leaders, will support and guide you.
  

In the capacity of a Brand Marketing Manager, you will ensure the efficient execution of business plans to meet future brand expectations and targets. You will also take part in the development of short-term tactical Brand Management marketing plans. You will ensure brand integrity by guiding efforts across multiple channels and functions and support the development and execution of offline, digital, and paid social advertising programs for the business.  

The role entails the management of media campaigns from the beginning to the end and is also responsible for the execution across all media channels inclusive of TV, Radio, Digital, Print, and Paid Social. The Brand Marketing Manager reports directly to the Director- Womennovator.
  

  

**The Impact You'll Make in this Role** -  

  

**Strategy :**
 You will play part in the development of the brand marketing strategies in order to establish strategic direction and program positioning. In this capacity, the Brand Marketing Manager, you will develop marketing partnerships with media partners, and other external partners in an attempt to broaden the reach of the business’s brand messaging.  

You will also play part in the development and execution of paid social programs on advertising platforms inclusive of Facebook, YouTube, Pinterest, and Twitter etc. along with supporting the brand’s paid media programs. At this capacity, you will contribute to the development and execution of all online/offline events, promotions for the business/brand.  

  

**Management:** You will play a managerial role in the production process for all offline marketing materials, for example, project timelines, and so forth. You will be tasked with the maintenance of the lower department’s operational production budget, ensuring that there is a continuous effective and economical allocation of resources. You will also supervises multiple external agencies in developing creative advertising, high-impact promotions, and media planning,event sponsorship.
  

You will additionally manage media timelines and executes plans across all media channels, that is, TV, Social, Radio, and Print etc. you will effectively supervisethe junior marketing staff/team, managing workflow, providing direction, and overseeing constant skill development. You will strike a balance in ensuring all branding and key information strategies are in line with overall business strategy without compromising the brand’s integrity.  

  

**Collaboration:** You will work closely with Director, in reviewing and approving all branded elements for advertising and launch materials inclusive of printed collateral, product packaging, online assets, launch toolkits, product logos, and videos etc..
  

In this collaboration, he/she also provides feedback and insight on the performance of program campaigns and relays them for further strategic development and solution formulation. You will serves as a collaborative partner and liaison between all internal product departments in ensuring integrated campaigns and cohesive strategies. Youwill also be tasked with collaborating with external partners in ensuring that all media plans are aligned with the business’s values and goals, are executed on-time and on-budget.
  

  

**Analytics:** You will also play an analytical role where you will conduct research and analyses, translating campaign performance into communication documents and reports, which are distributed to management and key stakeholders. Some of these documents are marketing briefs, competitive analyses, campaign recap decks, and so forth.
  

At this capacity, You will track spending on all media campaigns for the purpose of ensuring that brand marketing efforts always stay within the allocated budget. Here, you will actualize cost reports per project at the completion of each brand marketing campaign. You will prepare account management, expenditure, progress, and other related reports. Additionally, you will review targeted spends and make real-time adjustments to optimize brand marketing campaign performance.
  

  

**Knowledge and Opportunity:** You will also conduct regular and consistent research and keep the business and the brand marketing department informed on best practices and the latest trends in brand marketing that ensure that the business does not lag behind of its competition and also in order to provide growth opportunity for the brand by capitalizing on the acquisition potential that alternative branding strategies/approaches may hold.
  

At this capacity, you will ensure that the product/service maintains a consistent tone that is relevant to the business’s brand and the audience, solidifying the brand identity by ensuring consistent, on-time and accurate development, deliveryfor each brand marketing campaign.
  

  

**Other Duties:** You will also performs other tasks as designated by the Director.
  

  

**To set you up for success in this role from day one, Womennovator is looking for candidates who must have the following qualifications:**  

  

* MBA or Master's Degree in Marketing (Completed and verified prior to
 start) from an accredited university
* Five (5) combined years’ experience in brand management or integrated marketing
* Three (3) years people leadership experience


* Strong communications (written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal) skills, including tact, diplomacy, and ability to influence and navigate across a diverse and complex organization.


* Highly proficient in Ms Word, PowerPoint, and Ms Excel

  

**Age:** Preferably below 35 years as on the closing date for receipt of application

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Role: Marketing Manager  

Experience: 10–15 years in Marketing Domain.  

Education: Graduate - Marketing or MBA - Marketing Specialisation.  

Location: Pune.

**JOB SUMMARY:**  

  

SPAR Solutions seeks a dynamic, collaborative Marketing Manager to own, drive, and execute a comprehensive and integrated digital marketing and GTM strategy, product marketing, and campaigns in support of the business goals. He/She should be comfortable with day-to-day marketing activities, as well as long-term strategy, thriving with tight deadlines and changing needs. If you are a people person who loves the rewarding challenge of building a brand, we want to hear from you.

**POSITION REQUIREMENTS (Qualifications and Experience)**  

  

* Extensive demand generation experience in B2B tech, with expertise in leveraging digital channels to drive lead generation and brand amplification.
* Strong analytical skills, and demonstrable experience synthesizing data and making strategic decisions using Salesforce, Account Engagement (Pardot), etc.
* Empathy – for our team, our partners, our clients, and their customers.
* Team player with exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to operate and excel at strategic as well as tactical levels. Willingness to roll up sleeves to get the job done.
* Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, both at the executive level and with peers and cross-functional teams. Can clearly articulate ideas, frame problems and offer solutions.
* Ability to develop and optimize marketing strategies across key channels: SEO/SEM, paid social, email, owned web media properties, and third-party.
* Strong copywriting skills.
* Natural curiosity to discern product and solution messaging and position opportunities in the market to drive adoption and revenue targets.
* Oversee design and creatives.
* Strong and effective Storyteller.
* Knowledge of Pragmatic Product Marketing Framework.
* Thrive in complexity and ambiguity.
* Must be technically proficient and have a strong understanding of marketing processes.
* Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements.
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools.
* Analytical thinker, naturally curious, and thrives in working in cross-functional teams.
* Must be passionate about digital and interactive marketing strategies and integrated marketing.
* Must be motivated, a self-starter, a change agent and a perpetual learner.
**KEY DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* **Demand Generation:** Plan, implement, and measure multi-channel demand generation programs to drive brand awareness, inbound pipeline generation, and accelerated inbound revenue.
* **Leadership, Strategy, and Project Management:** Work directly with internal stakeholders, leadership and creative teams, leading the execution of our programs.
* **Data Analysis and Reporting:** Analyze performance data, report on the results, including campaign results, and data stories, and send recommendations. Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.
* **Revenue Accountability:** Be accountable to revenue results, not leads.
* Bring products and solutions to the market through a pragmatic approach.
* Manage and oversee the marketing team, interns, and agencies.
* Have a strong design, writing, video creation and storytelling background.
* Coordinate and oversee all marketing projects and be very comfortable working in an agile environment that is fast-moving and technical.
* Help manage the current partnerships and enhance our web, social, and traditional marketing initiatives.
* Develop digital marketing strategies including the management and optimization of SEM, SEO, Social Marketing, LinkedIn, Content Creation (Video, Design, Podcast, etc.) and Email Marketing Automation using industry best practices.
* Collaborate with key stakeholders to develop, monitor, and optimize programs throughout the customer journey and sales funnel.
* Identify opportunities to develop new channels and/or expand existing channels for customer acquisition.
* Paid Media Campaign Management: Plan, test, implement, and measure multi-channel media campaigns to drive inbound demand.
* Perform audience research to develop new campaign ideas for paid search and paid social.
* Manage day-to-day performance across several media channels including LinkedIn.
* Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.

**Note:**  

Should be open to adjusting to the US timings since collaboration with the US team is essential for this role.

**Physical Requirements:**

* **Should be willing to work from office.**
* **Should be able to join immediately.**
* Must be able to perform the essential functions of the position with or without reasonable accommodation.

**COMPANY PROFILE**:  

SPAR Solutions (based out of Atlanta, USA and Pune, India) is an employee-friendly place full of confident, result-oriented people with high energy levels and uncompromising work ethics. Compensation (matches or exceeds industry benchmarks) is driven by merit and performance; there is no limit to professional growth.


If you believe that values like a consultative, detail-oriented, quick learner, team player, high performance, creativity and fun are your calling, you would be a great fit on our team.  

  

**Contact Details:**  

Talent Acquisition Team  

HRM | HR Department/ SPAR Solutions  

Address: SPAR Solutions India Pvt. Ltd. Pune IT Park,  

B - 503, Bhau Patil Marg, 34 Aundh Road, Bopodi, Pune.  

Maharashtra, India. Pin Code: 411020.  

Website: sparsolutions.com  

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/spar-solutions-llc  

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sparsolutions  

FB: https://www.facebook.com/SPARsolutions

title: Development Associate
description:
**We help the world run better**


Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.Apply now!

 **Sales Development Associate CX - South East Asia**

 **Key Responsibilities & Tasks**


OUTBOUND:  

The purpose of this position is to extend SAP's market coverage in each segment for CX Software License by generating new pipeline through:  

1. executing Targeted Outbound Campaigns via phone, and email  

2. accelerating pipeline and increasing conversion by executing programmatic recycled (discontinued / disqualified leads) and reconstituted nurturing (aged pipeline)  

  

For targeted outbound campaigns, leads will be qualified according to the applicable methodology, and handed over to Sales using standard global process.  

  

Various aging leads and opportunities could be potentially assigned for nurturing with return back to the Sales Executive for Closure.  

  

The Sales Development Associate will be co-located in the Digital Hub. They will be joining in territory and account planning to support the team and will be the future candidate pool for transition into sales roles.  

  

Campaign Execution & Lead Management  

Plan and execute call and e-mail activities to generate Leads using the most efficient means together with manager/expert  

  

Support and cooperate with Field Marketing, Solution Specialists, Account  

Executive, Midmarket Sales Executive (MSE) Management  

  

Align with Sales colleagues for most effective territory planning and execution, covering all routes to market  

  

Generate and Qualify leads through proper means (cold calling, phone campaigns, email actions, etc.) in alignment with management  

  

Pass qualified leads to Sales resource for sales stage execution  

  

Regularly review lead pipeline and progression. Proactively give qualitative and quantitative feedback to Marketing on campaigns using standard procedures and reports  

  

Opportunity and Lead Nurturing  

Support on follow up on aging/stagnant leads and help to identify opportunities to re-energize back into an active sales cycles  

  

Plan call and e-mail activities in close alignment with Sales for most efficient opportunity acceleration  

  

The DNA will have the same KPIs as Sales, based on Pipeline & Revenue  

  

Data entry in the IC Web Client/ CRM system  

Document all, the campaign execution and lead/opportunity management activities using the adequate systems correctly in alignment with expert/manager  

  

Training & Enablement  

Assist in activities to enhance demand generation and product/solution skills  

  

Be active part of either classroom, e-learning, virtual classroom or mentor-lead activities  

  

Complete and qualify on all Level 1 enablement activities within 3 months and Level 2 activities in 12 months.

 **Experience & Educational Requirements:**

**> 1-3 years experience in Demand Generation or Inside Sales environment**


> Preferabley TeleMarketing experience, specifically high volume phone-centric work  

> High volume activity working environments, involving phone and a CRM / contact management system  

> Business level English: yes  

> Business level local language: yes  

  

**Education**  

> MBA or equivalent business experience

**We build breakthroughs together**


SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

**We win with inclusion**


SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.  

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:**


Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.


Requisition ID: 377569 | Work Area: Sales | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Graduate | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

title: Content Marketer
description:
Come work at a place where innovation and teamwork come together to support the most exciting missions in the world!
As the Content Marketing Manager, you will be a critical member of the marketing team and help build a steady cadence of rock-solid content for all stages of the funnel. The successful candidate in this role will be a self-starter who's passionate about creating engaging, valuable content for both senior business decision makers as well as practitioners in the security industry; is an amazing storyteller; and will have a passion for scaling a well-known brand in the security industry to the next level of growth.
Responsibilities:* Work with the content team to implement the multi-channel content strategy by crafting content


 that drives through leadership, customer acquisition and customer success.* Lead and inspire creative ideas for content development and messaging consistency across all


 channels (demand generation, digital, web, social, video, etc.).* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to create engaging stories aligned with company messaging.
* Drive effective and creative content that incites engagement and grows audiences.
* Ensure content aligns with funnel-building objectives and is consistently delivered across touch


 points.* Leverage data to set goals, measure success, and refine content strategy.
* Help maintain a functional content calendar and ensure style, quality, and tone consistency.
* Write and edit high-performing content with impeccable attention to detail.
* Copyeditor for a variety of marketing materials. Must have top-notch grammar and punctuation skills


 and be an overall arbiter of best grammar, messaging, writing, and style practices.
Requirements:* 5 plus years of content marketing experience in the cybersecurity industry is a must.
* Strong writing skills with a diverse portfolio of published work.
* Entrepreneurial mindset and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
* Excellent writing and editing skills and a love of grammar and top-performing content.
* Editorial mindset and familiarity with audience preferences.
* Knowledge of SEO, web traffic metrics, and demand generation tools.


Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Journalism, Public Relations, or related field

title: Associate Manager
description:
**About PhonePe Group:**



PhonePe is India’s leading digital payments company with 50 crore (500 Million) registered users and 3.7 crore (37 Million) merchants covering over 99% of the postal codes across India. On the back of its leadership in digital payments, PhonePe has expanded into financial services (Insurance, Mutual Funds, Stock Broking, and Lending) as well as adjacent tech-enabled businesses such as Pincode for hyperlocal shopping and Indus App Store which is India's first localized App Store. The PhonePe Group is a portfolio of businesses aligned with the company's vision to offer every Indian an equal opportunity to accelerate their progress by unlocking the flow of money and access to services.


**Culture**



At PhonePe, we take extra care to make sure you give your best at work, Everyday! And creating the right environment for you is just one of the things we do. We empower people and trust them to do the right thing. Here, you own your work from start to finish, right from day one. Being enthusiastic about tech is a big part of being at PhonePe. If you like building technology that impacts millions, ideating with some of the best minds in the country and executing on your dreams with purpose and speed, join us!



PhonePe's advertising monetization vertical is tasked with the responsibility of building & monetizing growth solutions for marketers across consumer facing ecosystems. Over the last 6 years PhonePe has built a massive and heavily engaged user base of over 500 Mn users. Providing services in the fintech space enables PhonePe to effectively cater to both consumer & advertiser needs. Team is responsible for generating direct bottom line ad revenue via platform monetization.



Core KPI will be absolute revenue driven from agencies aligned to the candidate.

  


**Responsibilities**


* Heavy focus on sales to unlock new accounts & grow existing accounts
* Strategize and execute merchant outreach to increase the funnel
* Focus on business development across industries to grow contribution in P&L
* Identifying key market segment and partners and drive long term partnerships
* Define & own revenue targets and grow the portfolio on an ongoing basis
* Create customer-oriented offerings basis an in-depth understanding of market trends
* Establishing sales strategy, funnel for the industry, executing campaigns & growing accounts
* Collaborate across internal teams including product, analytics, operations, finance, legal, etc


**Capabilities & Requirements:**


* MBA from reputed tier 1 campus with working experience of 3-5 years
* Exposure to start up environment / Ad sales / monetization is an added advantage
* Strong business acumen & understanding of the business
* Drive for result, able to demonstrate/quantify success relative to established targets and metrics
* An understanding of digital marketing landscape (depth in specific industries like Gaming)


**PhonePe Full Time Employee Benefits (Not applicable for Intern or Contract Roles)**


* **Insurance Benefits -** Medical Insurance, Critical Illness Insurance, Accidental Insurance, Life Insurance
* **Wellness Program -** Employee Assistance Program, Onsite Medical Center, Emergency Support System
* **Parental Support -** Maternity Benefit, Paternity Benefit Program, Adoption Assistance Program, Day-care Support Program
* **Mobility Benefits -** Relocation benefits, Transfer Support Policy, Travel Policy
* **Retirement Benefits -** Employee PF Contribution, Flexible PF Contribution, Gratuity, NPS, Leave Encashment
* **Other Benefits -** Higher Education Assistance, Car Lease, Salary Advance Policy


***Working at PhonePe is a rewarding experience! Great people, a work environment that thrives on creativity, the opportunity to take on roles beyond a defined job description are just some of the reasons you should work with us. Read more about PhonePe*** ***on our blog******.***

title: Fundraising Manager
description:
**Designation** - Digital Fundraising Manager  

  

**Reports to** – Director  

  

**Experience required** – 4-6 Years  

  

**Job Summary** - The Digital Fundraising Manager manages and oversees growth of online fundraising and engagement programs by executing effective strategies and techniques via email, website promotions, and other digital channels. The Manager will provide coordinated leadership of digital fundraising and engagement activities, developing and implementing marketing strategies to support fundraising across the organization.  

  

**Responsibilities include but not limited to** -  

* Leading and executing Womennovator’s digital programme to enhance our campaigning and fundraising:
* Develop our digital strategy and targets with oversight from the leadership team, to ensure we deliver on our campaigns and fundraising goals.
* Oversee digital fundraising and engagement initiatives to acquire, renew and retain members.
* Develop and manage emails, landing pages, tools and graphics for online fundraising activities,
* Implement Peer-to-Peer fundraising initiatives
* Pro-actively manage budgets, monitor and report on digital fundraising campaigns to ensure digital fundraising delivers on target.
* Grow Womennovator’s list and manage the email programme to ensure supporter-focused communications that drives action and maximises retention.
* Manage social media channels to ensure timely, platform-tailored content that encourages engagement.
* Update, develop and optimise Womennovator’s website
* Create engaging, optimised digital content across social media, email and webpages from inception to execution.
* Oversee budgets for specific projects as delegated
* Proactively stay updated with best-practice and industry

 developments, being the organisation’s resident digital expert, and advising other team members.

* Knowledge of and proven ability to develop and implement digital fundraising strategies.

* A team player that is detail-oriented, organized, motivated and creative.
* Must have good judgment and the ability to handle confidential matters.
* Enthusiasm for public media with a desire to create and share a solid case for support with staff, donors, viewers.

Job description


**Position Summary**



We are currently seeking a Manager/ Senior Manager - Media to oversee and develop our media service offering and to help, develop, execute, and optimize Interactive Avenues most challenging media strategies across all online platforms.

* Creating and presenting strategic digital media plans based on sound analytics, supported by data

* Participate in new business pitches, etc.

**Qualifications**



Education:

**What You Can Expect From Interactive Avenues**  

  

Interactive Avenue’s vision is to make advertising more insightful to the brands. We do this by employing the world’s very best talent to solve some of the toughest challenges of today’s digital marketing landscape. It’s important that we hire people whose values reflect those of our own: genuine, results-focused, daring and insightful. ##### **Job Description:**


**We are seeking a skilled and dynamic Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing campaigns across various online platforms. This role requires a strong understanding of digital marketing strategies, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to adapt to changing trends in the digital landscape.**


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive traffic, and generate leads.
* Manage and optimize digital advertising campaigns across platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and others.
* Create and manage content for various digital channels including websites, social media, email campaigns, and blogs.
* Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and analyze campaign performance to optimize and improve ROI.
* Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for growth and stay ahead of industry trends.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including sales, product, and creative to align digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices.
* Maintain brand consistency across all digital channels and ensure compliance with brand guidelines.


**Qualifications:**


* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.
* Proven experience in digital marketing with a strong understanding of digital advertising platforms, SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and content marketing.
* Hands-on experience with digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Business Manager, etc.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to create engaging content.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving skills with the ability to think strategically.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Relevant certifications such as Google Ads Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, etc., are a plus.
##### **Key Skills :**


* Content Editing
* Social Media Marketing
* Social Media Optimization
* Campaign Management
* Social Media

Ahmedabad based company with individuals with more than 5 years of experience on providing technology solution to customers

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Womennovator intends to engage Content writer cum Social Media Manager on the following terms and conditions:  

  

**Job responsibilities:** We need a content writer cum social media manager who will help in content creation, managing content on the website, and maintaining different social media platforms. The manager will develop and implement a Womennovator social media strategy, develop brand awareness, generate inbound traffic to social media platforms, and websites.
  

* Content Creation (Large and Technical) for the Womennovator’s website and social media platforms.
* Proofreading and editing.
* Content creation for Media (Print, Broadcast, and Digital)
* Managing social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Blogs, YouTube, LinkedIn), overseeing design (Facebook timeline cover pic, display ads, thumbnails, ads, profile pic, YouTube branding, Twitter profile, Instagram stories, and feed, and other theme-based events branding), overseeing day to day social media activity (addressing queries, concerns, flagging inappropriate comments and posts, writing and
scheduling daily posts, etc.).
* Help in the promotion (campaign planning and execution), create a unique voice for the brand on social media and Womennovator website and generate relevant content (on all social and online forums) to reach the audience most likely to engage with Womennovator.
* Develop a strategy to promote externally funded projects, executive education, in-house activities (seminars and workshops), and outbound events.
* Implement Search Engine Optimization (SEOs) for the website and Social Media.
* Using analytics (Google, Facebook, and other social media management tool) for effective social media presence and positive brand image of Womennovator.
* Maintain database for Womennovator & create and control the content calendar for several accounts across platforms, as well as the key influencer and stakeholders that touch them, both internally and externally.
* Liaise with internal teams such as clubs, committees, cells, programs, externally funded projects, theme-based events, etc., for content creation and management. Liaise with in-house designers and photographers, to produce creative assets and to share on different media channels.

  

**Womennovator Required qualifications:**  

* An M.A. degree in Mass Communication and Journalism or English or Media Studies or New Media Communication or Creative Writing or MBA in Marketing or Media Management.
* 3+ years of Social Media Marketing experience in corporate marketing, education the sector, social sector, or agency marketing role. Knowledge of Internet Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Web Development are desirable.
* Verifiable examples of social media marketing successes on different platforms - Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+, YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram.
* Expert level skills in using and navigating social media networks, native web apps, 3rd party social media tools.
* Candidate must possess good writing skills and the ability to visualize and convey a message with interesting and relevant content.

title: Inside Sales Representative
description:
As an Inside Sales Executive, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth through proactive sales efforts and building strong relationships with prospective clients. You will work closely with the sales team to identify opportunities, qualify leads, and convert prospects into customers.
  

**Responsibilities:*** Conduct outbound calls, emails, and LinkedIn outreach to generate leads and schedule demos with prospective clients.
* Qualify leads based on predefined criteria and effectively communicate to a value proposition to prospects.
* Collaborate with the sales team to develop customized sales strategies and pitch presentations to meet client needs.
* Manage the sales pipeline, track progress, and provide regular updates to the sales manager.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients through ongoing communication and support.
* Stay up-to-date on industry trends, competitive landscape, and our product offerings to effectively position our solutions in the market.
* Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets and KPIs.

**Requirements:*** Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.
* Proven track record of success in inside sales or telemarketing roles, preferably in the technology industry.
* Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate complex concepts clearly and persuasively.
* Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with clients over the phone and through virtual meetings.
* Self-motivated and results-driven, with a passion for exceeding sales targets and driving revenue growth.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Salesforce) and Microsoft Office suite.

**Benefits:*** Competitive salary and commission structure.
* Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement savings plan, and paid time off.
* Ongoing training and professional development opportunities.
* Dynamic and collaborative work environment with opportunities for growth and advancement.

**Company:**   

Our client's application is transforming business communication and CRM by merging Cloud Telephony, CRM, chat, email, SMS, and digital marketing into a cohesive platform. It incorporates automation features like auto-dialers, IVR, and workflow automation to boost operational efficiency. The CRM module facilitates personalized customer engagement through lead management and targeted communication. The product's scalability and forward-thinking design ensure adaptability to changing business requirements. Innovative AI-driven solutions include fine-tuning bots such as the Assist Bot for instant customer support and the Lead Qualification Bot for automated lead assessment. By streamlining operations, improving customer interactions, and harnessing AI technology, our client empowers businesses to thrive in today's competitive landscape. Whether a startup or a large enterprise, our client is the ideal partner for achieving efficiency and excellence in business communication and CRM.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
As a Digital Marketing Associate at Matsio, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing effective digital marketing strategies to enhance our online presence and drive business growth. You will work closely with the marketing team to execute campaigns across various digital channels, analyze performance metrics, and contribute to the overall success of Matsio's marketing initiatives.

* **Digital Campaign Management**

Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across channels such as social media, email, and display advertising.

Collaborate with the marketing team to create engaging and compelling content that aligns with Matsio's brand.

* **Social Media Management**

Manage and grow Matsio's presence on social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Monitor social media trends, engage with the audience, and analyze performance metrics to drive improvements.

* **SEO and SEM**

Implement SEO strategies to improve Matsio's search engine rankings and visibility.

Assist in managing paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, etc.) to maximize ROI and drive targeted traffic.

* **Content Marketing**

Contribute to content creation for various digital channels, ensuring alignment with Matsio's brand voice and messaging.

Collaborate with the content team to develop blog posts, articles, and other relevant content.

* **Analytics and Reporting**

Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of digital marketing efforts.

Prepare regular reports, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.

* **Collaboration and Communication**

Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and sales, to ensure cohesive and integrated marketing campaigns.

Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders and external partners.

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
* Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on ***social media, SEO, and SEM.***
* Familiarity with marketing analytics tools and platforms.
* ***Strong written and verbal communication skills.***
* Creative mindset with the ability to think strategically.

**DIGITAL MARKETING EXECUTIVE JD**

**Lead Generation Specialist (Digital marketing)**

Min experience – 2 years

Job location – work from office

Duration – 6 days in week

Profile – Full time

Salary – Between 20,000 – 25,000 per month

Incentive – As per policy

**Job details:**

A Digital Marketing Executive plays a crucial role in planning, executing, and managing online marketing campaigns for a company or client. The specific job details may vary depending on the organization, industry, and the scale of their digital marketing efforts. Here is a general overview of the typical responsibilities and qualifications for a Digital Marketing Executive:

**Job Responsibilities:**

1. **Campaign Planning and Execution:**

· Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.

· Plan and execute online marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, search engine optimization (SEO), and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising.

2. **Content Marketing:**

· Create and optimize content for digital platforms, including websites, blogs, and social media.

· Develop and manage content calendars to ensure a consistent flow of content.

3. **Social Media Management:**

· Manage and grow the company's presence on social media platforms.

· Create and curate engaging content, and interact with the audience to build brand awareness.

· Tele-calling for lead generation

· Converting into f2f meeting

· Handle all social;

4. **SEO and SEM:**

· Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic visibility (SEO).

· Implement and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads (SEM).

5. **Email Marketing:**

· Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.

· Monitor and analyze email campaign performance and make data-driven improvements.

6. **Analytics and Reporting:**

· Use analytics tools to track and measure the performance of digital marketing campaigns.

· Prepare regular reports, analyze data, and provide insights to improve campaign effectiveness.

7. **Budget Management:**

· Manage budgets for various digital marketing channels and campaigns.

· Optimize spending to maximize ROI and achieve marketing objectives.

8. **Market Research:**

· Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies.

· Conduct market research to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

2. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on campaign management.

3. Familiarity with various digital marketing channels and tools.

4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

6. Creativity and the ability to think strategically.

7. Proficiency in using digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, and social media management platforms.

8. Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.

Digital Marketing Executives often work closely with other departments, such as sales, design, and IT, to ensure a cohesive and effective digital marketing strategy. The role is dynamic and requires adaptability to the rapidly changing landscape of digital marketing

**Performance Marketing Manager**

**About the Company:**

Alviras Solutions is a dynamic digital marketing agency that thrives on creating compelling and result-driven strategies for businesses of all sizes.

We don't just navigate the digital landscape; we sculpt it, color it, and make it resonate with the heartbeat of global brands. We're not just marketers; we're digital artisans crafting experiences that leave a lasting impression.

Our core team is loaded with experienced digital marketing professionals, PPC, SEO experts, social media experts, content writers, website designers, graphic designers and web developers.

Alviras Solutions leverages online marketing to help top brands in USA, Europe & UK to grow exponentially. We have established a global footprint and serve clients from diverse industry verticals.

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
**Job Title:**

Head – Sales & Marketing

**Function:**

Sales & Marketing

**Grade:**

**Location:** 

Chennai

**Reporting to:**

Mr. Vilas Patil - Head of International Business & Corporates

* **POSITION OBJECTIVE**
* Responsible for leading and executing the Sales and Marketing strategies for the specialty steel trading business. This role involves developing and implementing effective Sales and Marketing plans to achieve revenue targets, expanding market share & enhancing the organization’s brand presence in the industry.
* **KEY POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES**

**Sr.**

**Key Responsibilities**

1

Sales Strategy and Planning:

* Identify the Product Mix Strategy for different Product lines - BAR, Flat Products, International Business, Wire rods
* Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to achieve sales targets and business objectives across different geographies.
* Identify market opportunities and emerging trends in the specialty steel industry.
* Analyze competitors and market conditions to formulate effective sales strategies to increase the gross profit margin.

2

Customer Relationship Management:

* Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, suppliers, and Industry stakeholders.
* Understand customer needs and provide customized solutions to enhance customer satisfaction.
* Ensure a high level of customer retention and loyalty.

3

Marketing and Branding:

* Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote the company's brand and products.
* Coordinate Marketing campaigns, trade shows, and promotional activities.
* Utilize digital marketing channels to enhance online presence.

4

Market Research and Analysis:

* Conduct Market research to identify new business opportunities and industry trends.
* Analyze customer feedback, market data, and competitor activities to make informed business decisions.

5

Sales Performance Analysis:

* Monitor and analyze Sales performance metrics to assess the effectiveness of sales strategies.
* Implement corrective actions and improvements as needed.
* Prepare regular reports for Senior management on sales and marketing activities.

6

Budget Management:

* Develop and manage the Sales and Marketing budget effectively.
* Ensure optimal allocation of resources to maximize ROI.

7

Team Leadership:

* Lead and motivate the sales and marketing team to achieve individual and team targets.
* Provide guidance, training, and support to enhance the team's skills and performance.
* Foster a collaborative and results-oriented team culture.
* **TEAM MANAGEMENT/LEADERSHIP**

**1**

* To attract, hire, lead and engage the Team and ensure effective management and achievement of business targets.

**2**

* Should be able to train, coach and guide the team in developing the right knowledge, skills and customer orientation.

**3**

* To assertively drive and ensure that the team is completely aligned on process discipline and meeting targeted milestones.

**4**

* Drive discipline in the team through regular review and feedback mechanisms and a complete grasp over data analytics / MIS for performance measurement.

**5**

* Have a zero-tolerance attitude towards lapses in integrity, compliances, internal governance standards and Company ethics.
* **QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENT**

**Qualifications**

Essential

* Master’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. MBA is a plus.
* Proven experience in sales and marketing leadership roles within the steel trading industry.

Experience

Minimum 02-06 years of experience in similar industry

* **COMPETENCY REQUIREMENTS**
* **Technical Skills**
* **Communication Skills**

**Skill**

**Attribute**

Technology

* Proficient in using CRM and other Sales and Marketing tools.

Industry Knowledge

* Strong understanding of specialty steel products and market dynamics.
* **Behavioral Skills**

**Competencies**

**Attribute**

Service Excellence

* Always managing Vendors with a positive attitude.
* Respecting the internal value chain.
* Detail oriented, self-motivated and highly organized.
* Excellent communication skills.
* Building honest relationships with vendors/contractors.

Professionalism

To conduct your actions with good judgment and in good faith.

Entrepreneurial

To be enterprising & take ownership of developing & identifying vendors and contractors.

Excellence

To act in a manner that earns the trust and admiration of others

Client Orientation

Sensitivity towards Customer Needs & Concerns and be responsible for commitments made.

Communication

The ability to connect with vendors and suppliers, customers and all stakeholders, effectively.

Influence

Ability to influence stakeholders in a smooth, non-abrasive manner

Stakeholder Management

Regular & appropriate engagement with all stakeholders, ensuring they are informed and aligned when required

Teamwork

Respecting & working together with the larger team to deliver value.

Time Management

Managing time discipline effectively and allocating the right time to the right activity.
