title: Account Manager
description:
www.exchange4media.com is a daily must-read for an influential audience of decision makers and disruptors across the advertising, media, and marketing landscape.

Founded in 2000 to cover a burgeoning industry with objectivity, accuracy, and fairness, exchange4media.com and its online and print publications continue to be powered by the highest standards of journalism. Today, exchange4media is one of India’s foremost media brands focusing on curated creativity, data and analysis, people and culture, and innovation and forecasting.

From vital print editions – Pitch (monthly) and Impact (weekly) – to must-attend events and innovative platform offerings, its industry-leading offerings include Indian Marketing Awards, dentsu-exchange4media Digital Advertising Report, Pitch CMO Summit, Impact 50 Most Influential Women, Indian Content Marketing Awards and Impact Person of the Year, among others.

We are looking for a Key Account Manager to join our team.

This is a great opportunity to work with some of the top Media, Entertainment and Technology professionals in the country. It would suit someone who is sociable, confident, self-motivated and wants to work in an environment where hard work and results are well rewarded.

Your responsibilities will include:

- To sell advertising and sponsorship packages and marketing solutions to the new business leads and existing clients.

- Conduct face to face-to-face/virtual client meetings with Heads of Sales/Marketing of some of the top Media & Entertainment sector companies.

- Manage an existing portfolio of key account clients, with a focus on exceptional customer service.

- Be responsible for the renewal of annual deals and maximize client spend.

- To create excellent proposals and presentations

- To develop ideas for new products and services that the company can launch

We are looking for Key Account Managers with the following skills/experience:

- 5-7 years’ previous sales experience, preferably within digital media/advertising/media.

- Knowledge of media, marketing, advertising, technology industry would be preferred.

- Ability to organize, plan, present and close deals in a logical manner.

- Excellent communication skills with the ability to communicate and build rapport at a senior level

* Monday to Friday

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**About the Company:**

Hectar is a fast-growing Agri Tech startup that is transforming the way Agri commodities are supplied across borders. We are digitizing cross-border supply chains, making them more efficient, transparent, and sustainable. Our mission is to empower farmers and buyers by providing them with cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights that help them make better decisions and achieve better outcomes. We are passionate about using technology to make the Agri supply chain more resilient, secure, and profitable for all stakeholders.

**Job Description:**

We're looking for a highly creative and talented individual to join our team as a Creative Content Writer and Social Media Manager. In this role, you will be responsible for creating compelling visual and written content that showcases Hectar Global's mission to digitize cross-border supply chains of Agri commodities. You will work closely with the marketing and sales teams to develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns across digital and social media platforms.

Your main goal will be to bring the Hectar Global brand to life and make it exciting, inspiring, and aspirational for our target audience. You'll also be responsible for creating high-quality, engaging content that resonates with our customers and drives brand awareness and loyalty.

**Responsibilities:**

1. Develop and execute Hectar Global's brand strategy across multiple channels

2. Create and implement social media campaigns that engage and inspire our target audience

3. Develop and produce high-quality, engaging content for social media, website, email, and other channels

4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, sales, and marketing, to ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints

5. Monitor and analyze social media and website metrics to track performance and identify areas for improvement

6. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, and apply them to our brand strategy and content creation

**Requirements:**

§ Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field

§ 1+ years of experience in brand strategy, content creation, and social media marketing

§ Strong creative vision and ability to bring ideas to life

§ Excellent written and verbal communication skills

§ Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, social media platforms, and content management systems

§ Passion for agriculture industry and making a positive impact on farmers' livelihoods

§ Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Join our team and help us bring the Hectar Global brand to life in a way that inspires positive change in the agriculture industry.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Schedule:

* Day shift

Application Question(s):

* Do you have experience in brand strategy, content creation, and social media

marketing?

* How quick can you pick up with Agri subject matters?

Experience:

* total work: 1 year (Preferred)

Ability to Relocate:

* Chennai, Tamil Nadu: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 12/03/2024

title: Junior Marketing Executive
description:
**Overview:**

We are seeking a motivated and creative Junior Marketing Person to join our team. This position will play a key role in assisting with the development and execution of marketing strategies to promote our brand and drive customer engagement. The ideal candidate will have a passion for marketing, excellent communication skills, and a strong attention to detail.

**Responsibilities:**

Assist in the development of creative campaign ideas and strategies under the guidance of the Marketing Manager.

Implement marketing activities, including but not limited to content creation, email marketing, and digital advertising.

Design compelling marketing materials for online and print campaigns, ensuring brand consistency.

Create engaging social media content, including posts, videos, and stories, to build brand presence and drive audience engagement.

Develop and maintain content calendars to ensure timely and consistent delivery of marketing messages across all channels.

Support customer acquisition and retention efforts through targeted marketing campaigns and initiatives.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to execute marketing campaigns effectively and efficiently.

Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics to track the success of campaigns and identify areas for improvement.

Stay informed about industry trends and best practices to continuously optimize marketing strategies and tactics.

Assist with other marketing-related tasks and projects as needed.

**Qualifications:**

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.

Previous experience in marketing or a related field is preferred but not required.

Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite) and social media management tools is a plus.

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Ability to multitask, prioritize, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
**About Us:**  
Founded in 2021, Sugarfit, is a collective of passionate pioneers, united by a singular vision: to tackle diabetes through evidence-based approaches and personalized metabolic care. Think of us as architects of holistic wellness. Our Personalized evidence-based path to Type 2 and Pre-Diabetes Reversal & management focuses on sustainably getting your blood sugar levels under normal range (HbA1c below 6.5%) and helping you maintain that for the long term by gradually reducing and eventually eliminating reliance on active medications. Fueled by $20 million in Series A funding from renowned investors like Cure.fit, Tanglin Venture Partners, Endiya Partners, and MassMutual Ventures, we're on a mission to transform how people manage their health. In other words, we do not settle for management; we engineer reversal. It is a bold ambition, demanding a bold approach. And that's where you come in.

**What Do We Do?** 

Sugarfit transcends a singular product; it is an ecosystem of transformation. Our expert led team leverage three things for the best outcomes:

1. The precision continuous glucose monitoring (CGM)

2. The intelligence of machine learning

3. The wisdom of medical science.

**Job Title:** Business Development Manager

**Location:** Bangalore Work from Office

**Overview**: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our team at sugar.fit, a leading diabetes reversal management company. The primary responsibility of this role is to forge strategic partnerships with doctors, diagnostic labs, pharmaceutical companies, and other service providers in the healthcare industry. The ideal candidate will be adept at establishing and nurturing relationships, negotiating contracts, and driving business growth through collaborative efforts.

**Responsibilities:**

1. Identify and target potential partners in the healthcare industry including doctors, diagnostic labs, pharmaceutical companies, and other relevant service providers.

2. Develop and execute a comprehensive business development strategy to establish partnerships and onboard them onto the sugar.fit platform.

3. Initiate and maintain regular communication with prospective partners to understand their needs, explore opportunities for collaboration, and address any concerns.

4. Negotiate partnership agreements and contracts with prospective partners, ensuring favorable terms for both parties.

5. Collaborate closely with internal teams including marketing, sales, and product development to ensure seamless integration and implementation of partnership initiatives.

6. Act as a brand ambassador for sugar.fit, representing the company at industry events, conferences, and networking functions.

7. Monitor and analyze market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify new partnership opportunities and stay ahead of the competition.

8. Track, measure, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to partnership initiatives, regularly providing updates to senior management.

9. Continuously strive to optimize and improve partnership processes and strategies to maximize business growth and ROI.

10. Uphold the highest standards of professionalism, integrity, and ethical conduct in all interactions and dealings with partners and stakeholders.

**Qualifications:**

1. Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field. MBA preferred.

2. Proven track record of success in business development, partnership management, or sales within the healthcare industry, preferably in the digital health or wellness sector.

3. Strong understanding of the healthcare landscape, including knowledge of medical practices, diagnostic procedures, pharmaceutical products, and regulatory requirements.

4. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and credibility with key stakeholders at all levels.

5. Strategic thinker with a proactive and entrepreneurial mindset, capable of identifying opportunities and driving initiatives to fruition.

6. Results-oriented with a demonstrated ability to meet or exceed targets and objectives.

7. Highly organized with excellent time management and project management skills, capable of managing multiple priorities simultaneously.

8. Proficient in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software.

9. Willingness to travel as needed.

**Why Should You Join Us?**

If you are a visionary who thrives at the confluence of cutting-edge technology and impactful endeavors, then Sugarfit is your calling. Here, you will have the opportunity to: ● Make a tangible difference in the lives of countless individuals. ● Push the boundaries of what is possible in healthcare technology. ● Shape the future of personalized health and leave a lasting legacy. ● And, have a lot of fun along the way! This is more than just a job; it is an opportunity to be a part of something truly revolutionary. Are you in?

description:
**About Convosight:** 

Convosight is a Brand Marketing platform for large consumer companies. With over 3bn+ people in communities and 75MM+ Creators, online communities are where people come together to discuss their interests, pain points, hobbies, etc. and these discussions typically lead to product and brand discovery.

Given brands don’t have access, Convosight has worked with 120+ large consumer brands in India.

Creating a new channel of Brand Marketing for Enterprises and Creating a sustainable income model for Community Creators, Convosight is the world’s first Community Marketing platform with access to 100k+ Communities with over 950MM+ members.

If you want an exciting career in a startup , Convosight is the place to be with young minds eager to create a mark for themselves in the media industry

About us Link: https://bit.ly/community-marketing-process-no-voiceover Website Link: https://www.convosight.com/

● You have 2+ Years of experience in Digital Marketing/ Influencer Marketing Agencies and experience in servicing large media agencies like GroupM, Interactive Avenues, etc

● You have developed great agency relationships with planners and buyers. You listen and understand brand campaign objectives, and can help problem-solve.

● You have strong convincing and networking skills. The ability to use your network,build and grow relationships, open up new client accounts, and drive measurable actions will be critical in this role.

● You enjoy challenges. Can meet critical project milestones and deadlines.

Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment with a high degree of autonomy.

● Strong verbal and written communication skills are a must

● Someone who is independent, self-motivated, and can stay efficient and productive without someone looking over your shoulder all day long

● Someone who is a voracious learner and proactive in nature ● Actively seeking to learn and view feedback as a beautiful gift ∙ Loves tackling ambiguous problems and shaping them into clear goals.

● If you value autonomy, believe in getting things done, are passionate, can turn ideas into reality, and enjoy working at an early-stage SaaS company, with minimal supervision – come join us!

Jr. Paid Media Performance Marketer who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

**About our Hiring Partner:**

A new era of technology for property sales & marketing We understand the challenges of different tenures when buying and selling a home. That’s why we’ve teamed up with developers, HAs and agents to create a new era of sales and marketing. Designed by people within your industry. responds to these challenges by providing a digital tool kit aimed at streamlining the sales experience for both the customer and provider. We are not just making it better, but making it work for you and your buyers.

Looking to be involved in a growing, global team? With our Digital marketing team members across the globe, this role has the unique opportunity to dive headfirst into driving paid digital marketing strategy and activity across up to 9 countries in Asia, working with our regional digital marketing managers, country managers and local area marketing teams.

**As a Performance Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for technical functions such as:**

* Build, test, and optimize paid ad campaigns on META, Google Ads, LinkedIn, etc. to consistently improve performance
* Analyse and report on campaigns, A/B tests, leads, and revenue and ROI.

* Contribute to Crimson’s paid digital marketing activity across multiple countries, working with Crimson’s regional digital marketing managers, country managers, local area marketing teams and the global digital marketing team to drive for results.

**How you’ll know you’re crushing it (KPI’s):**

* Digital marketing revenue targets are achieved consistently across all markets you are working with.
* Strong ROI across digital marketing channels.

New Zealand-based Edutech company was founded in 2013 with the idea that through personalized education, we can transform students into the world leaders of tomorrow. Our network includes 2,400 tutors and consultants worldwide who work with over 20,000 students. title: Sales Executive
description:
**We help the world run better**


Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

 **What you’ll do**


As a Digital Sales Executive, some of your responsibilities will be:

* Actively leverage cutting edge technologies to ensure compelling customer interactions, delivering volume, value, and velocity in the assigned sales territory
* Collaborate with Digital Hub resources (Digital Solution Advisory, Digital Deal Strategy, Digital Assets, etc.) to deliver the best value to our customers, at speed, and being able to reach as many accounts as possible
* Collaborate with Partner Business Managers to create partner business plans for the territory covered, identifying growth opportunities and actively engaging in strategies to maximize revenue
* Support the creation, monitoring, and review of business development activities related to solution or industry specialization. Propose innovative approaches to generate new business and execute them, either directly or indirectly through marketing, sales development, or partner teams
* Coach partner sales representatives on engaging with prospects in complex software deals within the specialization area. Help position the value of the respective software or industry solution by providing ROI analysis, business case development, references, analyst data, etc.
* Collaborate with Sales Development Executives to drive more pipeline and successfully move prospects through the customer journey with SAP
* Successfully leverage all SAP sales channels (SAP Store, Partners, direct sales, etc.) to achieve sales targets and provide the best customer experience possible
* Support the team and the organization in the prevention and⁄or identification of challenges, and the ideation of possible solutions
* Help partners independently drive business by providing guidance based on data-driven insights: What products to position, when, and where
* Ensure alignment with Indirect Channel Management, including Partner Business Managers and Inside Partner Business Managers, based on key channel economics. Collaborate closely with similarly specialized sales roles when available
* Monitor the effective and appropriate use of SAP assets, including presales resources, by partners.
* Provide regular reports on sales progress throughout the year with guidance. Identify deviations from agreed-upon plans and actively engage in corrective measures to achieve sales goals

 **What you bring**

* Bachelor's degree in any field from an accredited university, with preference for Business Administration, Computer Science, or related field
* 4+ years of experience in enterprise software sales, sales enablement, business development, software industry operations, or related area is required
* Profound knowledge of an industry operating model and/or SAP solution
* Knowledge of Cloud technology (SaaS, DaaS, PaaS) in business to business environments
* Polished professionalism with above-average organizational, planning, and problem-solving skills
* Strong presentation skills as well as excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Proficiency with MS Office, communications software (Teams, Zoom, etc.), and presentation software (Canva, Adobe, etc.)
* Passion for working in a tech sales environment
* Hunger for learning and making a difference
* Strong work ethic: Team player, self-starter, high energy, and results oriented
* Business fluency in English required

 **Meet your team**  

The Digital Sales team is responsible for bringing our go-to-market and sales strategy to life in their assigned territories. Sales teams can be specialized in industry or SAP products. They work collaboratively with other SAP colleagues and partners to provide the best possible experience to the customers in their territories through our digital operating model (Digital Sales Motion).

 **We build breakthroughs together**


SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

**We win with inclusion**


SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.  

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:**


Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**About Us:**  
At King of Digital Marketing, we are at the forefront of revolutionizing digital marketing strategies. We believe in the power of innovation, creativity, and strategic thinking to drive impactful results for our clients. With a dynamic team and a passion for staying ahead of industry trends, we're committed to delivering unparalleled digital marketing solutions.

**Job Description:**  
We are seeking a talented and experienced Digital Marketing Manager to join our team. As a Digital Marketing Manager at King of Digital Marketing, you will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversions for our clients.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to, social media, email, SEO, SEM, and content marketing.
* Analyze campaign performance metrics and optimize strategies to maximize ROI and achieve KPIs.
* Conduct market research and stay updated on industry trends to identify new opportunities for growth.
* Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to coordinate marketing initiatives and ensure brand consistency.
* Manage digital marketing budgets effectively and allocate resources strategically to achieve business objectives.
* Stay updated on emerging technologies and tools in digital marketing and recommend innovative solutions to enhance campaign effectiveness.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field. (Master's degree preferred)
* Proven experience as a Digital Marketing Manager or similar role, with a minimum of [X] years of experience.
* In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels, tools, and best practices.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive informed decision-making.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Demonstrated leadership skills and the ability to manage and mentor team members.
* Experience with marketing automation platforms and CRM systems is a plus.
* Passion for staying abreast of industry trends and a commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary range of 16,000 - 25,000 per month, commensurate with experience and qualifications.
* Opportunities for career growth and advancement within a fast-paced and innovative work environment.
* Collaborative and inclusive company culture with a focus on teamwork and creativity.

Join us at King of Digital Marketing and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of digital marketing excellence. If you're passionate about driving results and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you! Apply now and take your career to the next level with us.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Experience- 5 years - 6 years  
We are seeking a highly skilled and dynamic Marketing and Business Development Manager to join our team at Metadrob. As the Marketing and Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing our marketing efforts while also driving business growth by expanding our customer base and creating new revenue streams. This role requires a strategic thinker with a strong background in marketing, business development, team management, and a proven ability to generate new orders and establish new verticals.  
Responsibilities:

Marketing Strategy and Execution:

* Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with the company's goals and objectives.
* Oversee all marketing activities, including SEO, SMO, PPC, content marketing, and social media campaigns.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling content and promotional materials that drive engagement and generate leads.
* Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, optimize campaigns, and provide insights to enhance marketing effectiveness.

Business Development:

* Identify and target potential clients, build strategic partnerships, and generate new business opportunities.
* Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and new verticals for expansion.
* Lead the sales process from prospecting to closing, negotiating contracts, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with key clients, industry influencers, and partners to drive business growth.

Team Management and Cost Control:

* Manage and mentor a team of marketing and business development professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve team objectives.
* Set clear performance goals, conduct regular performance evaluations, and foster a collaborative and high-performing team culture.
* Monitor and control the cost of the marketing and business development activities, ensuring efficient resource allocation and ROI optimization.

Financial Analysis and Forecasting:

* Conduct financial analysis, track marketing and business development expenses, and prepare regular reports for management review.
* Collaborate with the finance team to develop accurate revenue forecasts and budgets for the marketing and business development department.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).
* Proven experience (X+ years) in marketing management, business development, and team leadership.
* Strong knowledge and experience in marketing strategies, SEO, SMO, PPC, and digital marketing channels.
* Demonstrated track record of successful business development, including lead generation, client acquisition, and revenue growth.
* Excellent negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain strong client relationships.
* Strategic mindset with the ability to identify new market opportunities and drive business expansion.
* Strong financial acumen, with the ability to analyze financial data, control costs, and forecast revenue.
* Leadership skills with a proven ability to manage and inspire a diverse team.

Join us on this exciting journey of transforming the retail industry through cutting-edge technology. If you are a dynamic and results-oriented professional with expertise in marketing, business development, team management, and a passion for driving growth, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and help us take Metadrob to new heights!  
Note: Please include your portfolio or relevant work samples along with your application

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
Sales and Marketing Associate at Zorrro  
Location : Kolkata  
About Zorrro :  
Zorrro is a leading hyperlocal delivery service based in Kolkata, dedicated to providing prompt and efficient delivery solutions to businesses and consumers alike. Our mission is to streamline the local logistics landscape through innovative solutions, exceptional service, and community-focused initiatives.  
Position: Sales and Marketing Manager  
Role Overview:  
We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales and Marketing Associate to lead our B2B sales efforts and marketing strategies. This role involves a hands-on approach to identifying and engaging with potential business clients, devising effective marketing plans, and working closely with the design team to create compelling social media campaigns. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with a proven track record in sales and marketing, possessing the ability to drive growth and increase market share in the competitive hyperlocal delivery sector.  
Key Responsibilities:  
- Develop and execute strategic B2B sales plans to identify, engage, and secure new business opportunities within the Kolkata area.  
- Lead and coordinate marketing efforts, including market research, brand strategy, and the execution of marketing campaigns to increase brand visibility and market penetration.  
- Collaborate with the design team to create engaging and effective marketing materials and social media content, ensuring consistency in brand messaging across all platforms.  
- Plan and manage social media strategy, including content creation, scheduling, analysis, and engagement to enhance online presence and community engagement.  
- Analyze market trends and competitor activity to inform strategic decisions and identify opportunities for growth.  
- Establish and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and team members, to foster collaboration and drive business results.  
- Monitor and report on the effectiveness of sales and marketing initiatives, using data to refine and adjust strategies as needed.  
- Lead, motivate, and develop the sales and marketing team to achieve set goals and objectives.  
Qualifications:  
- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.  
- Minimum of 1-3 years of experience in sales and marketing, with a focus on B2B sales and digital marketing strategies.  
- Proven track record of developing and executing successful sales and marketing plans.  
- Strong understanding of the Kolkata market and the hyperlocal delivery industry.  
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.  
- Proficient in using social media platforms and marketing tools to drive business objectives.  
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  
- Strong analytical skills with a data-driven approach to decision-making.  
What We Offer:  
- A dynamic and challenging work environment with the opportunity to contribute to the growth of an innovative local business.  
- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.  
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.  
- A collaborative team culture that values creativity, innovation, and diversity.

Company Overview:

[Aurastha] is a dynamic and innovative digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses thrive in the online landscape. We specialize in providing comprehensive digital marketing solutions tailored to the unique needs of our clients. As we expand our clientele, we are seeking a Part-Time Digital Marketing Sales Manager to join our team and drive sales growth through effective client onboarding and relationship management.

Job Description:

As a Part-Time Digital Marketing Sales Manager, you will play a crucial role in acquiring new clients and expanding our business. The ideal candidate should have a passion for digital marketing, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in sales. This position is part-time, and we encourage female candidates to apply.

title: Ads Specialist
description:
**We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Paid Advertising Specialist, who will be responsible for creating, implementing, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across various digital platforms to achieve the company's marketing objectives. Your expertise in analyzing data, identifying target audiences, and crafting compelling ad creatives will be crucial in driving quality traffic, maximizing conversions, and increasing ROI.**

What you’ll be doing:

* Develop comprehensive paid advertising strategies aligned with business goals and target audience preferences.
* Conduct thorough market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and industry trends.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate paid advertising efforts with overall marketing campaigns.
* Set up, launch, and monitor paid advertising campaigns across platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc.
* Create ad copies, headlines, and visuals that resonate with target audiences and drive engagement.
* Analyze campaign data to evaluate performance, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions.
* Generate regular reports outlining key metrics, trends, and insights to stakeholders.
* Manage advertising budgets effectively to ensure maximum return on investment.
* Monitor spending, adjust bids, and allocate resources based on campaign performance and objectives.
* Keep abreast of developments in digital advertising platforms, tools, and best practices.
* Share insights and recommendations with the team to enhance overall marketing strategies.

Who are we looking for?

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business Administration, or related field.
* Proven experience in managing paid advertising campaigns across multiple platforms.
* In-depth knowledge of digital advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads, etc.
* Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools like Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, etc.
* Creative mindset with the ability to develop compelling ad creatives and messaging.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

title: Social Media Manager
description:
### **Job Information**


Sports Vertical


**US Sports**Role Type


**Social Media**Industry


**Media****Remote Job**


### **About us**


**Sportskeeda - For the hardcore sports fan**

  

Fans don't just follow the sport, they feel it - the pain, the passion, the guts, and the glory. When we at Sportskeeda look at sports fans we don't see a crowd; we see you. We're one of you, and we strive to keep you on top of every possible sports trend by creating engaging and insightful content at lightning-quick speed.

  

Established in 2009, Sportskeeda is a global sports content platform that covers the world's biggest sports and esports subjects and serves over 100 Million fans every month. Our passionate team comprises top content creators from around the world who produce hundreds of well-researched content pieces on a daily basis.

  

We are a Great Place to Work certified organization, with employees and contributors working from various corners of the globe.

  


### **Job Description**


This is a remote position.

  

  

Key Responsibilities:  

  

* Help Manage several of Sportskeeda’s accounts, and media presence by producing
  
* quality content for various platforms while sticking to the strategies developed as a team.
  
* Handle several accounts on different USA Sports
  
* Coordinate with the rest of the Social Media team ensuring no piece of content is missed.
  
* Analyze media trends, validating news and executing them in real time.
  
* Writing texts and copyright for Sportskeeda on various social networks
  
* Planning, developing, and producing content buckets.
  
* Analysis of the competition
  
* Help grow Sportskeeda’s traffic through US Sports content from social media.
  
* Work 9-hour Shifts 6 days a week.
  
* Produce quality content while sticking to the company guidelines.
  
* Help grow Sportskeeda’s traffic through US Sports content on social media.
  

  

  

  

### **Requirements**


* MUST HAVE EXPERT KNOWLEDGE on at least one of the following sports NBA, NHL,
  
* MLB, NFL
  
* MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE working in any position related to Social Media Manager
  
* MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE in caption writing/ copywriting
  
* Have a basic understanding of other USA Sports.
  
* Advanced level of English (Written and Spoken)
  
* Excellent spelling and writing
  
* Understanding of social media and Social Media Trends
  
* Experience Working in social media.
  
* Have your computer with internet access.
  
* Basic knowledge of digital marketing
  
  

  

**Apply Now**

title: Marketing Manager
description:
**Company Overview**

The Sagar Hospitals® is a prestigious healthcare services institution with two tertiary care multi-specialty hospitals, four clinics, and a chain of 12 pharmacies. We are a division of the esteemed 400 INR Crore Sagar Group, established in 1960. Our healthcare services have achieved a global brand status, bringing pride to Bangalore. We have received various accreditations and are known for our medical and technological successes.

**Job Overview**

We are looking for an experienced Senior International Marketing professional to join our team at Sagar Hospitals. As the International Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to expand our brand presence globally. This is a full-time position based in Bangalore, India, and requires a minimum of 7 to 10 years of experience in international marketing.

**Qualifications and Skills**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
* Proven experience in international marketing, preferably in the healthcare industry
* Strong understanding of global markets and cultural nuances
* Creativity and ability to think outside the box to develop innovative marketing strategies
* Proficiency in social media platforms and marketing tools
* Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
* Excellent leadership and project management abilities
* Knowledge of advertising techniques and principles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Develop and execute international marketing strategies to promote our brand and services
* Identify and analyze market trends and competitive landscape to identify opportunities and threats
* Drive international market research and competitor analysis to understand and adapt to market dynamics
* Plan and oversee marketing campaigns and initiatives targeted at international markets
* Manage and coordinate with external agencies, partners, and vendors to execute marketing activities
* Create compelling marketing collateral, including brochures, presentations, and website content
* Utilize social media platforms and digital marketing tools to enhance brand visibility and engagement
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and branding across all channels
* Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and initiatives
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in international marketing

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**Job Description:**

**Role:** Digital Marketing & Brand Manager

**Location:** Jaipur

**Industry:** Gems & Jewellery

**Employment Type:** Fulltime

**Position Overview:**

We are seeking a dynamic and creative Brand Manager to lead our branding efforts. The

successful candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our end-

to-end branding strategy and content creation efforts. This role requires a deep understanding

of various branding and marketing principles, social media platforms, media channels,

exceptional communication skills, and a passion for storytelling through engaging content.

**Responsibilities:**

· Design a comprehensive brand marketing strategy across all channels - digital, offline and PR.

· Execute marketing strategies effectively and to enhance brand presence and drive business growth.

· Develop and implement a strategic content plan that supports the company's business goals, reflects our brand voice, and meets our target audience's needs throughout the inbound marketing funnel.

· Conduct market research to grasp market trends, customer needs, and competitive insights, informing our content strategy.

· Maintain brand consistency across all content production, upholding our identity and messaging standards.

· Work closely with marketing, sales, and product teams to develop a cohesive content calendar that maps precisely to the stages of the customer journey.

· Interacting with building relationships with Influencers, journalists and media outlets for brand promotion.

· Lead the development of brand positioning, messaging, and visual identity to ensure consistency across all channels.

· Work with stakeholders to ensure brand marketing is in sync with paid/unpaid marketing efforts and align with business goals.

· Prepare a structured framework for objectively measuring the efficacy of brand marketing efforts and undertake improvement efforts consistently.

· Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify unique branding opportunities

· Work with external agency partners, internal channel marketing, design teams in ensuring execution conformance.

· Oversee and handle improve all social media accounts and ensure brand consistency, right brand portrayal & online reputation.

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
Assistant Manager- Sales & Marketing will be primarily responsible for executing the sales strategy of the resort with the ultimate objective of maximizing revenues by optimum usage of online and offline platforms

Key Duties & Responsibilities

* Devise and implement the overall sales and marketing plan for the resort and actively monitor its progress in terms of achieving KPI’s, budgets and revenues.
* To be responsible to develop and foster business through pro-active online and offline platforms.
* Liaise with the General Manager in adopting sales strategies for the resort
* Build-on and develop relationships with major agencies for promoting the resort
* Analyse current markets and identify new markets and potential clients.
* To optimise and achieve sales and revenue generation through digital marketing initiatives and social media campaigns
* Effective usage of all tools including telemarketing, direct mail, appointment calls etc.
* Manage the number and performance of third party and promotional websites and liaise with providers in ensuring optimisation of the resort’s online position.
* Proactively monitor the Resort’s profile on the various social media platforms and ensure appropriate responses are posted in a timely fashion.
* Liaise with outsourced Digital Team in managing the content of the Resort’s website.
* Manage all promotional collateral from copyright through to design and print and ensure that it is in line with our branding
* Ensure in house promotional material is current, effective and supports any new sales and marketing promotions.
* Manage the guest database and ensure that client’s details are accurate and UpToDate.
* Ensure that all client correspondence is tracked and recorded, including quotations and contracts.
* Represent the resort at consumer trade fairs, mall promotions and tourism events both at local and national level.
* Maintain the highest standards of professional conduct at all times when dealing with clients, guests etc.
* Conduct weekly snapshot meetings with GM update on activities/sales to date and plans for the weeks ahead.
* To prepare and submit weekly Sales & Marketing activity reports to the GM.
* Monitor the progress of sales team through weekly/ monthly activity reports
* Encourage positive working relations with all departments by regular communications and feedback.
